csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <choose>
              <if position="near-note">
                  <text value="Note is near!"/>
              </if>
              <else>
                  <text value="Note is not near."/>
              </else>
            </choose>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
